message: This seems pretty self-explanatory. Especially if corporations are going to start using convore for in-house communication. Topic text can be sensitive.
I would prefer to have a choice for visible and invisible private groups, e.g. if you have a support group about something, you can have it findable and still invite only
we chose to make private groups visible so that people could request to join them
in the future we may add a third option for hidden groups
seconded, I think hidden groups are a must
+1 for hidden groups especially if we want to use Convore for in-house communication.
